lines.en: He was living with grandmother Cottontail-Boy.

lines.np: "wáaqo' 'úutkuyxtece hinmetúune 'iwéepne yox̣ ke 'uus q'o' heté'ew. kíne ta'c kíye hipt hanyóoyo' kaa hiwíix̣eleleynu'."
lines.en: "Now I go take from Thunder his wife that which is most beloved. Here good food I will prepare and do various tasks."

lines.np: "'ee, háacwal, wéet'u. híiwes cikáaw'is. k'omáayc 'ee hixyú'."
lines.en: "You boy, no. He is to be feared. Hurt you he will to you"
"To be feared! Even when you are not afraid of me; I am also be feared!"
Then he went.
There he saw each one here and there.

lines.np: hiwíix̣n'isix yox̣mú' ha'áyat, kál'a 'ilx̣níiwe titóoqan hix̣n'isíix. koná hinaspaynóoya.
lines.en: They dig roots those women, just many people they are digging roots.
"Where are Thunder's wives?"
"That they are," they told him.

lines.np: kaa wáaqo' píine, "máwa 'itúupx háacwalnim hinesten'ewíise hinmetúune 'iwéepne?"
lines.en: And now they said to each other, "Whatever why boy inquires about them Thunderer's wives?"

lines.np: kawó' kii hinéeskiyuye. kíi'u hiwsíix páax̣loo ha'áyat hiqn'isíix qém'es kaa hinéesne, "wisíix hinmetúum 'iwéepne?"
lines.en: Then this he went to them. Here there are five women they are digging camas roots and he said to them, "You are Thunderer's wives?"
"Yes," they said.

lines.np: kaa héenek'u hinéesne, "mínikuu híiwes q'o' heté'ew hinmetúum?"
lines.en: And again he said, "Which one is Thunder's most beloved?"

lines.np: "iy," píine, "manáma yox̣ manáa hihíce háacwal mínikuu híiwes q'o' heté'ew. cimík'is! kawó' kee 'epehín."
lines.en: "Oh," they said to each other, "wherefore that what he says the boy which one is most beloved. Hateful one! Then now let us tell him."

lines.np: kaa wáaqo' péecene, "yox̣ 'uus hinmetúum q'o' hete'ewníx 'iwéepne."
lines.en: And now they said to him, "that has Thunder's most beloved wife."
Here he went over to her Cottontail-Boy and he said to her, "Put aside your digging stick."
"Oh!", she the women suddenly said, "The boy he says, put your digging stick aside. What is this he does in craziness?"

lines.np: "iníix túukes. ku' manáa tax̣c hixyú'," péecene.
lines.en: "Put aside digging stick. Something definately he will do," they told her.

lines.np: kii hiwqíinime túuk'es kaa héenek'u' péene, "'ew'níix 'isp'áalx̣na."
lines.en: This she threw away digging stick and again he said to her, "put aside the digging bag"

lines.np: hihíce, "'isp'áalx̣na 'ew'níix. kál'o' ku' manáa háacwala pé't'impse," héenek'u' hinéesteqeene 'áayatom.
lines.en: He is saying, "The digging bag put it aside. Just somewhat boy he is becoming mentally deranged," again she told them the women.

lines.np: "ku'úsu' kuy. kee 'epehékin ku' manáa hikutet'éese háacwal."
lines.en: "That way do. Let us see him of things what he is about to do the boy."

lines.np: kii hi'níike 'isp'áalx̣ kaa péene hey'úuxchaclwalnim, "kawó' kuum. tiwíixnim."
lines.en: Here she laid aside digging bag and Cottontail Boy said to her, "Now come. Follow me."
"He is saying follow me. No just I will not follow."
And she said to the boy, "Foolish you say, boy. Why should I go with him!"
This boy seized her arm and dragged her along.
Even though she tried to brace herself with her feet, no
Just, speedily he took her along.
Even though they too the women they dashed there just they too he dragged along.

lines.np: kawó' kii ha'átway hipewléetene háama, hinmetúune.
koná péecene, "'ee 'iwéepne hi'péen'is hey'úuxchacwalnim. wáaqo' 'ee hi'néhney'se."
konó' wáaqo' hixíic'emnime hinmetúun kaa kál'a, "t'uumm!" hiwéetxtime.
kii qáaca'c wáy'at koná 'etim'néenekime kaa hiwíinime.
"qáaca! wáaqo' 'awcáaqa, cikaw'íisna 'ee 'exyéey'se 'iwéepne. wáaqo' 'ata'átksaqa, wéet'u' ku'uús kuy."
kii wáaqo' hi'néhneme 'iwéepne hey'úuxchacwal kaa 'ipí hinmetúun hitqeke'éykime.
kaa wáaqo' 'ipelíixt kál'a hiinmíye, "t'oox̣!" kaa hitqasay'óox̣o'ma.
wéet'u' lak'ápc hikóoqana, kál'a púutkuuxne hinmíine kaa 'ipsúuski ku'ús páa'pan'ixqana kaa hityóoxnaqana, "'íimcim lililápc!"
hicúuxwece, "c'alwí tax̣c lak'áapc tax̣c kiyú tax̣c hitáamyano'."
úuyit hinméet kál'a páa'iy'aca 'áayatona kaa wéet'u' páatamyaca hey'úuxchacwala.
kál'a puuléexne tuk'ú'x kaa wéet'u' lak'ápc hikúuye 'étke hicúuxwece, "c'alwí tax̣c lak'áapc kiyú' tax̣c 'úylepwene hináastamyano'"
péene, "háacwal. wáaqo''ee haswaláya haníim. naksáaqa cikáaw'is wees mét'u 'éetem qétu cikáaw'is 'iim wees. wáaqo' 'ee 'iwéepne 'inpéenim.
'inekíix waqá q'o' heté'ew 'iwéepne wáaqo' 'ee pi'ínpe'nim. kíimtem'cimk'ey netíitelwit hiwéhyem kaa ku'us hipewíixu' koná.
'iwéepne pi'ínpen'yu' titóoqan. 'inekíix q'o' héetewin 'iwéepne mét'u ku'us pi'ínpen'yu' kem ku'ús 'iim 'ee 'íine 'inpéenim."
kaa péenexcixliike kú'nu kál'o' 'itúupx, 'étke wéet'u' qu'ys hiwsíine.
wáaqo' q'o' hipáayna koná hi'níike 'éemti kaa ha'cóya qáaca'c kaa péene, "wáaqo' 'ináhpayks 'iwéepne."
'inekíix qáac'c 'allawíya, 'uus 'iwéepne cikaw'iíisnim, c'awíin míiw'acpa ha'áta kaa koná péexne hiwqsu'úce 'áayat.
